Html:
hey Tanks ! Do you use Burst time or Mitigation scale ?

I prefere Burst time but I'd like an other opinion

I've added in Burst Time and Reaction time as values that you can optimize for in TankDK.  And should be available in the current release.  I still need to catch up to finish the 3.2 changes.  But after doin' the reading for the Burst & Reaction times I'm beginning to like it.  The graphs are all based on the Mitigation/Survival/Health ratings that are pretty common across all the Tank* modules.
